string-array.name: lvlDesc
string-array.item: Tidal Wave is a 2.1 solo Extreme Demon level created and published by OniLink and verified by Zoink on 9 September 2023 after 49,534 attempts. It is notable for its three-minute length, wave-based gameplay style similar to that of a Nine Circles level, its uniquely bright summer/beach theme.

Avernus (formerly known as The Inferno or The Gates) is a 2.1 Extreme Demon mega-collaboration level hosted by BoBoBoBoBoBoBo (commonly shortened to Bo) and PockeWindfish and co-hosted by Kyhros. It was published by PockeWindfish and verified by Zoink on 22 March 2023 after 27,732 attempts

Acheron is a 2.1 Extreme Demon mega-collaboration hosted by ryamu and Riot, published by ryamu and verified by Zoink on 23 August 2022 after 72,808 attempts. The level features a dark, predominantly grayscale theming blended with red accents

Silent clubstep is a 1.8/1.9/2.1 former impossible solo Extreme Demon level created, hack-verified and published by Sailent. It is a silent-level remake of the main level Clubstep and one of the most famous levels in Geometry Dash

Abyss of Darkness (commonly abbreviated to AoD) is a 2.1 Extreme Demon mega-collaboration hosted and published by Exen. The level features extremely tight timings with no strong emphasis on one game-mode

Kyouki is a 2.1 solo Extreme Demon created, verified and published by Demishio The level features fast gameplay with near humanly-impossible timings and quick game-mode changes, making the level very difficult to learn.
Slaughterhouse is a 2.1 Extreme Demon mega-collaboration level created by IcEDCave, EndLevel, river, Iris, DrCuber, CDMusic and Brittank88, published by IcEDCave

Sakupen Circles (formerly known as Iron God) is a 2.1 Extreme Demon collaboration level hosted by Muffy450 The level is a remake of the 1.9 impossible level of the same name and takes several gameplay ideas from Iron God, an older level created by Muffy450.
"???" Level is yet to be described

KOCMOC (cosmos)[Notes 1] is a 2.1 Extreme Demon mega-collaboration level created and published by the members of Cherry Team The level is heavily inspired by the former Top 1 Demon Slaughterhouse, with most of the gameplay consisting of tight, spam-based wave segments.
